      public boolean performCatch(Creature enemyCreature)
      Performs a catch attempt on an enemy creature.
      Parameters:
      enemyCreature - the enemy creature to perform the catch attempt on
      Returns:
      true if the catch is successful and the enemy creature is added to the player's inventory, false otherwise
